name: le monde est sombre #03
description:
this series of digital drawings, this one inspired by the account given to me by my master and friend josé ramón sánchez, a Latin American surrealist painter. in the story he tells me that when he met the surrealist writer André Breton he sánchez completed the sentence in the French newspaper LE MONDE adding it's dark, Breton instigated asked sánchez more why the world is dark to which sánchez replied: when I open the window I put the hands out feel the shadows of the world. 
PNG. 4200x3700px 300dpi / drawing and digital collage/
